p: According to HPLC analysis, the rate of polyphenols contained in Caralluma europaea extract ranged from 0.034 to 2.772 μg/ml. The ferulic acid concentration was determined at 2.772 μg/ml, followed by quercetin with 0.77 μg/ml. The concentrations of myricetin, gallic acid, and hesperetin were estimated at 0.350 μg/ml, 0.135 μg/ml, and 0.034 μg/ml, respectively ( Table 2).
